subject: Question re Simsonn Plus X Hydraulic Pedal Black Set
description_text:
Hi does Simsonn Plus X Hydraulic Pedal Black Set work with logitech sim
steering wheel sets?

conversations.body_text: Hi Brian Veitch,     Our pedal set connects directly to your computer via USB and is compatible with steering wheels from other brands.  Thank you for your inquiry. Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact us anytime. We will respond as soon as possible.
